DOC.detailed_description: The long-term safety human mesenchymal stem cell ( hMSCs ) ( Chondrogen ) yet establish . This 3-year follow-up study provide additional data gain understanding safety investigational agent . This study design determine safety single intra-articular injection 50 million donor-derived hMSCs 150 million donor-derived hMSCs suspension commercial sodium hyaluronan compare injection vehicle ( dilute hyaluronan ) alone . The injection perform initial study , Protocol No . 550 .
